revised_title: Neutral and Radiative Decay Modes of New Resonances: A Discussion
tldr: This article discusses the neutral and radiative decay modes of new resonances through experiments conducted at the Deutsches Elektronen-Synchrotron (DESY) using the DORIS accelerator. The authors present preliminary results on the decay of new particles and their final states containing photons. They analyze the detector design and the data collected to determine the properties of the new resonances and their decay modes.
